00036 # define _XED_ILD_H_

00045 /* ILD-related defines:
00046  *
00047  * XED_ILD - for building ILD module 
00048  * XED_ILD_CHECK  for using ILD module in decoding and checking 
00049  *                results against regular decode
00050  * XED_ILD_ONLY - for using only ILD for length decoding, without
00051  *                regular decoding. This is for performance measurements.
00052  */
00053 
00054 static XED_INLINE xed_uint_t xed_modrm_mod(xed_uint8_t m) { return m>>6; }
00055 static XED_INLINE xed_uint_t xed_modrm_reg(xed_uint8_t m) { return (m>>3)&7; }
00056 static XED_INLINE xed_uint_t xed_modrm_rm(xed_uint8_t m) { return m&7; }
00057 static XED_INLINE xed_uint_t xed_sib_scale(xed_uint8_t m) { return m>>6; }
00058 static XED_INLINE xed_uint_t xed_sib_index(xed_uint8_t m) { return (m>>3)&7; }
00059 static XED_INLINE xed_uint_t xed_sib_base(xed_uint8_t m) { return m&7; }
00060 static XED_INLINE xed_uint_t bits2bytes(xed_uint_t bits) { return bits>>3; }
00061 
00062 
00063 typedef enum {
00064     XED_ILD_MAP0=0,
00065     XED_ILD_MAP1=1,
00066     XED_ILD_MAP2=2,
00067     XED_ILD_MAP3=3,
00068     XED_ILD_MAPAMD=4,   /* amd 3dnow */
00069     XED_ILD_MAP_XOP8=5, /* amd xop */
00070     XED_ILD_MAP_XOP9=6, /* amd xop */
00071     XED_ILD_MAP_XOPA=7, /* amd xop */
00072     XED_ILD_INVALID_MAP
00073 } xed_ild_map_enum_t;

00076 #define XED_GRAMMAR_MODE_64 2
00077 #define XED_GRAMMAR_MODE_32 1
00078 #define XED_GRAMMAR_MODE_16 0

00091 XED_DLL_EXPORT xed_uint_t
00092 xed_instruction_length_decode(xed_decoded_inst_t* d);

00097 /* Special getter for RM  */
00098 static XED_INLINE xed_uint_t
00099 xed_ild_get_rm(const xed_decoded_inst_t* ild) {
00100     /* Sometimes we don't have modrm, but grammar still
00101      * likes to use RM operand - in this case it is first
00102      * 3 bits of the opcode.
00103      */
00104     xed_uint8_t modrm;
00105     if (xed3_operand_get_has_modrm(ild))
00106         return xed3_operand_get_rm(ild);
00107     else 
00108         modrm = xed3_operand_get_nominal_opcode(ild);
00109         return xed_modrm_rm(modrm);
00110 }
00111 
00112 /* compressed operand getters */
00113 
00114 static XED_INLINE xed_uint_t
00115 xed3_operand_get_mod3(const xed_decoded_inst_t* ild) {
00116     return xed3_operand_get_mod(ild) == 3;
00117 }
00118 
00119 static XED_INLINE xed_uint_t
00120 xed3_operand_get_rm4(const xed_decoded_inst_t* ild) {
00121     return xed3_operand_get_rm(ild) == 4;
00122 }
00123 
00124 static XED_INLINE xed_uint_t
00125 xed3_operand_get_vexdest210_7(const xed_decoded_inst_t* ild) {
00126     return xed3_operand_get_vexdest210(ild) == 7; 
00127 }
00128 
00129 static XED_INLINE void 
00130 xed3_check_set_ia_map(xed_decoded_inst_t* d, xed_uint8_t c4byte1){
00131     xed_uint8_t map = c4byte1 & 0x1F;
00132     if (map > XED_ILD_MAP3){
00133         xed3_operand_set_map(d,XED_ILD_INVALID_MAP);
00134     }
00135     else{
00136         xed3_operand_set_map(d,map);
00137     }
00138 }
